metadata.title: CVE-2024-35859 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: block:fix module reference leakage from bdev_open_by_dev error path At the timebdev_may_open() is called, module reference is grabbed already, hencemodule reference should be released if bdev_may_open() failed. This problemis found by code review.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
